node.excerpt: A  TabBar  models the bottom tab bar of an iOS app. Each of the bar's tabs is represented by an icon and an optional title. Props Prop Type Notes tabs Tab[] See  Tab  below. currentTab string   |  The current tab's  text  or index. onChangeTab…

The Learn Design System supports the  Material Design System’s icons . Below you’ll find a list of every valid icon name. You can use these names as the  icon  prop in the  Button ,  Link  and  Icon  components. ...

Value Each of the input components in the Learn package accept a  value  prop. We can use this prop to set the initial value of the input, or to sync its value with another part of our project’s state. Different input components have values of…
